public class Application
extends org.red5.server.adapter.ApplicationAdapter
implements org.red5.server.api.service.IPendingServiceCallback

It is the base class of chat server application. It overwrites the methods of ApplicationAdapter class. See ApplicationAdapter description in Conference Application section. \nChat server stores the chat messages from clients (from group chat). It uses SharedObjectListener to listen to the chat messages passed between clients using ChatSO SharedObject. When a new client join the group chat, the server send the chat history to the client. Extends ApplicationAdapter class to

appStart

public boolean appStart(org.red5.server.api.IScope app)
Description copied from class: org.red5.server.adapter.MultiThreadedApplicationAdapter
Called once on scope (that is, application or application room) start. You override MultiThreadedApplicationAdapter.appStart(IScope) or MultiThreadedApplicationAdapter.roomStart(IScope)} in your application to make it act the way you want.

Specified by:
appStart in interface org.red5.server.adapter.ApplicationMBean
Overrides:
appStart in class org.red5.server.adapter.MultiThreadedApplicationAdapter
Parameters:
app - Application scope object
Returns:
true if scope can be started, false otherwise

roomConnect

public boolean roomConnect(org.red5.server.api.IConnection conn,
                           java.lang.Object[] params)
Description copied from class: org.red5.server.adapter.MultiThreadedApplicationAdapter
Handler method. Called every time new client connects (that is, new IConnection object is created after call from a SWF movie) to the application. You override this method to pass additional data from client to server application using NetConnection.connect method. See MultiThreadedApplicationAdapter.appConnect(IConnection, Object[]) for code example.

Specified by:
roomConnect in interface org.red5.server.adapter.ApplicationMBean
Overrides:
roomConnect in class org.red5.server.adapter.MultiThreadedApplicationAdapter
Parameters:
conn - Connection object
params - List of params passed to room scope
Returns:
Boolean value
